body_html:
According to git blame, this test (test_Conv2d_groups_thnn) was added long time ago 00410c4

I just reran the test and it's still failing https://ci.pytorch.org/jenkins/job/pytorch-builds/job/py2-clang7-rocmdeb-ubuntu16.04-test/1538/

I guess better keep skipping it in rocm CI for now.

body:
According to git blame, this test (`test_Conv2d_groups_thnn`) was added long time ago https://github.com/pytorch/pytorch/commit/00410c4496c3aaa5782f0e5f249bb3b0b2f3d94a

I just reran the test and it's still failing https://ci.pytorch.org/jenkins/job/pytorch-builds/job/py2-clang7-rocmdeb-ubuntu16.04-test/1538/

I guess better keep skipping it in rocm CI for now.
